name: Chainsquare
description: Chain Square has built a platform for the point trading industry. Cryptocurrency exchanges or digital currency exchanges are businesses that allow customers to make payments by converting CHS to other point assets. The Chain Square platform is a platform that allows customers to pay by exchanging other point assets for point tokens; the creator of the point token is compatible with CHS. On the ChainSquare platform, point providers can independently run businesses that maintain and manage accounts.
